alert.note: Alert for Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 09 at 5:08AM EST until January 10 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.7 to 7.9 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Bristol MA and Southern Plymouth MA Counties. In Rhode Island, Southeast Providence RI, Eastern Kent RI, Bristol RI, Washington RI and Newport RI Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding occurs along the most vulnerable shoreline locales in Newport, Portsmouth and Middletown. This includes flooding at parking lots near beaches in Newport, and a portion of Hazard Road. Minor coastal flooding also occurs on several streets in the Common Fence Point area. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
